pgrid.network
Interface MessageListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageManager
public interface MessageListener

The listener interface for receiving notification about new incoming messages. Everytime a new message is received the statusChanged() method would be used to inform all listeners.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt
